amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by the Administration to conduct its anti-fossil fuel climate change agenda, which includes the National Climate Assessment, the IPCC report, the UN's Agenda 21, and the Social Cost of Carbon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in Part A of House Report 113-460 to prohibit funds for the Administration to conduct any anti-fossil fuel climate change agenda, which includes the National Climate Assessment, the IPCC report, the UN's Agenda 21, and the Social Cost of Carbon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 192 (Roll no. 231).
